sentences.sContent: All those lives maintained in the rarefied air of the absurd could not persevere without some profound and constant thought to infuse its strength into them.
sentences.sContent_eng: All those lives maintained in the rarefied air of the absurd could not persevere without some profound and constant thought to infuse its strength into them.
sentences.sCn: 没有某种深邃的思想一成不变地为之输入力量，所有这些在荒谬的稀薄空气中维持的生命都无法继续。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + fuse(流) → 流进去 → 灌输

trans.tranOther: to fill something or someone with a particular feeling or quality
